mapper.select: SELECT talk.id, user_info.nickname, user_info.avatar, talk.content, talk.images, talk.is_top, talk.status, talk.create_time FROM tb_talk talk JOIN tb_user_info user_info ON talk.user_id = user_info.id WHERE talk.id = #{talkId}

SELECT talk.id, user_info.nickname, user_info.avatar, talk.content, talk.images, talk.is_top, talk.create_time FROM tb_talk talk JOIN tb_user_info user_info ON talk.user_id = user_info.id WHERE talk.status = 1 ORDER BY talk.is_top = 1 DESC, talk.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT talk.id, user_info.nickname, user_info.avatar, talk.content, talk.images, talk.create_time FROM tb_talk talk JOIN tb_user_info user_info ON talk.user_id = user_info.id WHERE talk.id = #{talkId} AND talk.status = 1
